name: FormElementTest
description: Tests for the FormElement class, focusing on form controls, form data creation, and form submission.

test_cases.name: hasAssociatedControls
test_cases.description: Tests that the form element correctly identifies and counts associated controls.

test_cases.name: createsFormData
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of form data from form elements, including handling of selected options and checked boxes.

test_cases.name: formDataUsesFirstAttribute
test_cases.description: Tests that form data uses the first attribute when multiple attributes with the same name are present.

test_cases.name: createsSubmitableConnection
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a submitable connection from a form element, including handling of form method and action attributes.

test_cases.name: actionWithNoValue
test_cases.description: Tests the form submission when the action attribute is not set, ensuring the base URI is used.

test_cases.name: actionWithNoBaseUri
test_cases.description: Tests the form submission when no base URI is set, ensuring an exception is thrown.

test_cases.name: formsAddedAfterParseAreFormElements
test_cases.description: Tests that forms added after parsing are recognized as FormElements.

test_cases.name: controlsAddedAfterParseAreLinkedWithForms
test_cases.description: Tests that controls added after parsing are correctly linked with their forms.

test_cases.name: usesOnForCheckboxValueIfNoValueSet
test_cases.description: Tests that a checkbox without a value attribute uses 'on' as the value.

test_cases.name: adoptedFormsRetainInputs
test_cases.description: Tests that adopted forms retain their input elements.

test_cases.name: removeFormElement
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of a form element and ensures it is no longer included in the form data.

test_cases.name: formSubmissionCarriesCookiesFromSession
test_cases.description: Tests that form submission carries cookies from the session, ensuring correct cookie handling and order.

test_cases.name: formElementsAreLive
test_cases.description: Tests that form elements are live and updates are reflected in the form data.
